origin: This tutorial can contain obsolete information.
local: 本教程可能包含过时的信息.

origin: The description here was tested on Windows 7 SP1. Nevertheless, it should also work on any other relatively modern version of Windows OS. If you encounter errors after following the steps described below, feel free to contact us via our
local: 这里的描述是在Windows7SP1上测试的.不过,它也应该适用于任何其他相对现代的Windows操作系统版本.如果您在执行以下步骤后遇到错误,请随时通过我们的联系方式与我们联系

origin: . We'll do our best to help you out.
To use the OpenCV library you have two options:

. While the first one is easier to complete, it only works if you are coding with the latest Microsoft Visual Studio IDE and do not take advantage of the most advanced technologies we integrate into our library. .. _Windows_Install_Prebuild:

local: 启动所选的web浏览器并转到

local: 在这个脚本中,我假设您使用64位的VS 2015

origin: and opencv will be installed in c:/lib/install/opencv
with no Perf tests, no tests, no doc, no CUDA and no example

origin: Next time you run this script, opencv and opencv_contrib will be updated and rebuild

origin: These videos above are long-obsolete and contain inaccurate information. Be careful, since solutions described in those videos are no longer supported and may even break your install.

origin: If you are building your own libraries you can take the source files from our
local: 如果您正在构建自己的库,您可以从我们的

origin: Building the OpenCV library from scratch requires a couple of tools installed beforehand:
local: 从头开始构建OpenCV库需要预先安装几个工具:

origin: An IDE of choice (preferably), or just a CC++ compiler that will actually make the binary files. Here we will use the
local: 一个IDE的选择(最好),或只是一个CC++编译器,将真正使二进制文件.在这里我们将使用

origin: . However, you can use any other IDE that has a valid CC++ compiler.
local: . 但是,您可以使用任何其他具有有效CC++编译器的IDE.

origin: , which is a neat tool to make the project files (for your chosen IDE) from the OpenCV source files. It will also allow an easy configuration of the OpenCV build files, in order to make binary files that fits exactly to your needs.
local: ,这是一个从OpenCV源文件生成项目文件(用于所选IDE)的简洁工具.它还允许轻松配置OpenCV构建文件,以便生成完全符合您需要的二进制文件.

origin: Git to acquire the OpenCV source files. A good tool for this is
local: Git获取OpenCV源文件.一个很好的工具就是

origin: . Alternatively, you can just download an archived version of the source files from our
local: . 或者,您可以从我们的网站下载源文件的存档版本

origin: OpenCV may come in multiple flavors. There is a "core" section that will work on its own. Nevertheless, there is a couple of tools, libraries made by 3rd parties that offer services of which the OpenCV may take advantage. These will improve its capabilities in many ways. In order to use any of them, you need to download and install them on your system.
local: OpenCV可能有多种风格.有一个“核心”部分将自己工作.尽管如此,仍然有一些由第三方制作的工具库,它们提供OpenCV可以利用的服务.这些将在许多方面提高其能力.为了使用它们中的任何一个,您需要下载它们并将其安装到您的系统上.

origin: of OpenCV. For now use the version
. This is also a must if you want to build the
is a scientific computing package for Python. Required for the
local: 是Python的科学计算包.所需的

origin: is used inside OpenCV for parallel code snippets. Using this will make sure that the OpenCV library will take advantage of all the cores you have in your system's CPU.
local: 在OpenCV内部用于并行代码段.使用它可以确保OpenCV库能够充分利用系统CPU中的所有核心.

origin: may be used to improve the performance of color conversion, Haar training and DFT functions of the OpenCV library. Watch out, since this is not a free service.
local: 可以用来提高OpenCV库的颜色转换、Haar训练和DFT函数的性能.小心,因为这不是免费服务.

origin: OpenCV offers a somewhat fancier and more useful graphical user interface, than the default one by using the
. For a quick overview of what this has to offer, look into the documentations
local: . 要快速了解它所提供的内容,请查看文档

origin: section. Version 4.6 or later of the framework is required.
local: 部分.需要4.6或更高版本的框架.

origin: is a C++ template library for linear algebra.
local: 是一个线性代数的C++模板库.

origin: will allow you to use the power lying inside your GPU. This will drastically improve performance for some algorithms (e.g the HOG descriptor). Getting more and more of our algorithms to work on the GPUs is a constant effort of the OpenCV team.
local: 允许你使用GPU内部的电源.这将大大提高某些算法(例如HOG描述符)的性能.让越来越多的算法在gpu上工作是OpenCV团队不断努力的结果.

origin: source files are required for the library to work with this high dynamic range (HDR) image file format.
local: 库需要源文件才能使用这种高动态范围(HDR)图像文件格式.

origin: The OpenNI Framework contains a set of open source APIs that provide support for natural interaction with devices via methods such as voice command recognition, hand gestures, and body motion tracking. Prebuilt binaries can be found
local: OpenNI框架包含一组开源api,通过诸如语音命令识别、手势和身体运动跟踪等方法为与设备的自然交互提供支持.可以找到预构建的二进制文件

origin: is a documentation generator and is the tool that will actually create the
local: 是一个文档生成器,是实际创建

origin: Now we will describe the steps to follow for a full build (using all the above frameworks, tools and libraries). If you do not need the support for some of these, you can just freely skip this section.
local: 现在,我们将描述完整构建(使用上述所有框架、工具和库)要遵循的步骤.如果您不需要这些支持,您可以自由地跳过本节.

origin: -> It creates two projects for building the documentation of OpenCV (there will be a separate project for building the HTML and the PDF files). Note that these are not built together with the solution. You need to make an explicit build project command on these to do so.
local: ->它创建了两个用于构建OpenCV文档的项目(将有一个单独的项目用于构建HTML和PDF文件).请注意,这些不是与解决方案一起构建的.为此,需要对这些对象执行显式的build project命令.

origin: -> OpenCV comes with many example applications from which you may learn most of the libraries capabilities. This will also come handy to easily try out if OpenCV is fully functional on your computer.
local: ->OpenCV附带了许多示例应用程序,您可以从中了解大多数库功能.如果OpenCV在您的计算机上完全可用,那么这也很容易尝试.

origin: -> Prior to version 2.3 with this you could build a project that will build an OpenCV installer. With this, you can easily install your OpenCV flavor on other systems. For the latest source files of OpenCV, it generates a new project that simply creates a zip archive with OpenCV sources.
local: ->在版本2.3之前,您可以构建一个将构建OpenCV安装程序的项目.有了它,您可以轻松地在其他系统上安装OpenCV风格.对于OpenCV的最新源文件,它生成了一个新项目,该项目只需使用OpenCV源文件创建一个zip存档.

origin: -> With this you can control to build DLL files (when turned on) or static library files (*.lib) otherwise.
local: -> 通过此选项,您可以控制生成DLL文件(启用时)或静态库文件(*.lib).

origin: -> Each module of OpenCV has a test project assigned to it. Building these test projects is also a good way to try out, that the modules work just as expected on your system too.
local: -> OpenCV的每个模块都分配了一个测试项目.构建这些测试项目也是一种很好的尝试方式,模块在您的系统上也能像预期的那样工作.

origin: -> There are also performance tests for many OpenCV functions. If you are concerned about performance, build them and run.
